title: The Profitable Pursuit of Mango Farming #agribusiness

subtasks: Understand ideal climate conditions for mangoes
Learn about farming practices including irrigation, fertilization, pest control, and disease management
Consider spacing and planting density for keat/Apple mango varieties
Evaluate market demand and government support
Explore adding value through mango processing
Assess the impact of tree size and scale on profitability
Consider export opportunities and compliance with regulations
Consult agricultural experts and extension services
